title: "North Las Vegas is using AI to translate public meetings in real time"
excerpt: "The North Las Vegas City Council became the first jurisdiction in Nevada to incorporate real-time transcribing and translating software powered by artificial intelligence (AI) for its public meetings, starting with a meeting last week."
